mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(PA.ipayment) FROM payment PA JOIN product_payment PP ON PA.ipayment = PP.ipayment JOIN product P ON PP.iproduct = P.iproduct join payment_status PS on PA.ipayment = PS.ipayment WHERE (PA.ibuyer = #{iuser} OR P.iuser = #{iuser}) AND PS.istatus = -4

SELECT if(P.iuser = #{iuser}, PA.ibuyer, if(PA.ibuyer = 1, P.iuser, 0)) as diffIuser, (select COUNT(ireview) from review where ipayment = #{ipayment}) AS reviewCount FROM product_payment PP JOIN payment PA ON PP.ipayment = PA.ipayment JOIN product P ON PP.iproduct = P.iproduct WHERE PA.ipayment = #{ipayment}
select iuser, message, code, num, name from push_message where iuser = #{iuser}
